title: TCL P715 139 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Full Screen & Handsfree Voice Control  (55P715)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N Stand, 1N Audio Cable, 1N User Manual, 1N Warranty Card, 1N Remote, 2N Batteries, 1N Wall Mount
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Chrome-cast Built-in, Google Play Store, Google Assistant / Works with Alexa, Android TV, Hands-free Voice Control
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Headphone Output, USB 2.0, Optical SPDIF Output/HDMI ARC, 3 HDMI (1.4b and 2.0) and HDCP 2.2, 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n 2T2R
product_specification.Other Dimensions: VESA Mount: 400 x 200 mm (M6 Screw Size)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product + 1 Year Additional on Panel
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship. Parts and Labor Cost is Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, etc). Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer. Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock. Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.HDR 10 Technology: The TCL 108 cm (43) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV (43P715) is equipped with HDR 10 technology for ensuring an impressive picture quality in any content that you watch. It does so by adjusting the content in a scene-by-scene process for maintaining adequate contrast levels with a wide colour gamut.
product_description.Inbuilt Google Assistant: With an inbuilt Google Assistant in this Smart TV, you can just say 'Hey Google' or 'Ok Google' to effortlessly control various TV functions, such as switching channels, making program reservations, and managing smart home devices (lights, curtains, etc.) with just your voice. This way, you can free your hands and make your life convenient without stressing over the remote control.

review: Tcl 55p715 i got this tv for 35750rs on bb days sale.its lowest price anyother online and offline store.Fast delivery and within 30minutes installation done thanks to the Flipkart.About tcl tv i realy not happy with brightness its just 270nits.i have mi 55inch also mi picture quality and brightness much more batter than tcl almost same price of this tv.media player not playing many formats.i feel this panel will get long life atleast 5years.good things tcl itself giving 3years warranty.when we compare mi,vu tvs picture quality better than tcl.but mi and vu will not get long life.tcl will work long life.sound is fine.arc working well with my av receiver control my amplifeir.android os well with this tcl tv.expept pictures clarity and quality everything is fine with tcl.instead of buying Samsung,lg,sony we can buy tcl tv.but same price u get mi and vu tv.but built quality tcl better.only picture quality mi and vu better exept that tcl better.smooth operation.fast start.wifi diconnects often.Hd and sd channels are good clarity but not best.

Very much satisfied at present , video quality superb , no cost EMI facility is too good .But xtended warranty is not provided for this order .After 1 year only ,we can tell about its working , quality ,service etc..

The Tv as such is good but the software could be better, it has a few lags. Delivery was amazing but it's been a week since it was delivered and even though the installation was late it was good .



But the product as such is great . if they can tweek the software and get it running without lags will be amazing

Picture quality is damn good along with the software but post 1 month started getting issues. Remote was not working properly. Thanks to the customer support we got a new replaced one after 2 weeks. Till now I have reset the TV twice because it was not connecting to the wifi. One can prefer this TV if he or she has some friend in TCL.
It's nice, but not so good
Best product /good .But sound quality is worst , not a good speaker ,

So far the product is good...crisp and clear especially the viewing angle...
It took around 8 days to be deliver the product..
Nice one but connectivity issues and hands free voice control and all not tat much user fre Google is very late using command

As expected 👏
This is the fourth TCL lcd/led TV that I bought at different point of time and for different purposes in last 8 years. With each purchase my trust on this brand goes up. This time, especially because of the TCL installation team's support. They fulfilled their promise despite of the pandemic situation.

This is my first 55 inch tv. It was delivered within 24 hrs. Installation within 48 hours. My family is very happy with this product.

Superb Selection and quality

And installation also is very well before time.
Thanks to Flipkart for fast delivery and installation within 24hours.Awesome picture quality,sound and connectivity.I m happy with this product.recommended 👍👍go for it without any doubt.👍
quality of TV is very good i love it

Delivered as scheduled. Installation done the very next day morning. I was worrying about the transportation of my tv. Flipkart delivered it intact. The TV working good. It is only 2 days since delivered. I found no issues except the audio sound for dialogue that can be improved. The sound blaring for music and the dialogue gets low when connected on OTT apps. Sound gets lower in TV mode when connected to a set top box. Flipkart technical support Engineer advised me to change the HDMI cable to 2.1 to solve that issue. I will try it. Otherwise it is a good Tv.
Its nice tv good picture quality
Worst tv panel complaint and don't buy this brand
Value for money and overall performance good
Best picture and sound quality. connectivity is very good.Worth buying
good price for this quality TV
Best picture quality and sound quality
I am very satisfied the product. Delevery and instalation on same time.
This is the 3rd TV I have bought from TCL and the TV is awesome 👍
According to price excellent quality picture

Not really impressed with the kind of performance this one has...
1. while switching between apps it takes time, internet is not the issue it's just that the processor isn't that top notch.
2. Remote is dead already
3. TV needs a soundbar as it doesn't deliver sound in a 200sqr ft room.
4. Picture quality is okay (talking about 4k quality with colors and contrast)
5. I haven't tried gaming yet so no comments. 4k 60hz isnt my thing though.
6. overall i would rate it 3/5, would also suggest if you're looking for something good would suggest to stick with the renowned brands like sony or maybe LG.

Will hopefully switch someday to a better brand if I get really frustrated someday as of now I'm trying to adjust :')
After 1 hour of use TV goes on full brightness mode

I was using LG 43 inch 4k UHD tv before, it got damaged with in 3 years so when i thought of buying a new 4k tv TCL came to my mind. till now the performance of the tv is above to my expectation and i will recommend it to my friends and family
